          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Väder 1</string>
            <string language="en">Weathers 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwittert 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Survit à à 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resiste a 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espone all'aria 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ξεπερνά 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resiste a 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Här tränar vi ord och uttryck för att beskriva olika väderlekar.Modul 2 - Vad kostar det? - Ord och uttryck 2.Safir.</string>
            <string language="en">Here, we accustom words and expressions in order to describe various weather games.

Module 2 - what costs it? - words and expressions 2.

Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">sfi</string>
            <string language="sv">svenska</string>
            <string language="sv">språk</string>
            <string language="sv">väder</string>
            <string language="sv">väderlek</string>
            <string language="en">Safir</string>
            <string language="en">sfi</string>
            <string language="en">Swedish</string>
            <string language="en">languages</string>
            <string language="en">weathers</string>
            <string language="en">weather play</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier gewöhnen uns wir Wörter und Ausdrücke, um
verschiedenes Wetter games.Module 2 zu beschreiben - welche Kosten es?
- Wörter und Ausdrücke 2.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ici, nous accoutumons des mots et les expressions
afin de décrire divers survivent à-elles à games.Module 2 - 
quels coûts il ? - mots et expressions 2.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui, nós acostumamos palavras e expressões a 
fim descrever o vário tempo games.Module 2 - que custos ele? - 
palavras e expressões 2.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui, accustom le parole e le espressioni per 
descrivere il vario tempo games.Module 2 - che costi esso? - 
parole ed espressioni 2.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ, εμείς accustom λέξεις και εκφράσεις 
προκειμένου να περιγραφεί η διάφορη ενότητα 2 καιρικών 
παιχνιδιών - ποιες δαπάνες αυτό; - λέξεις και εκφράσεις 
2.Safir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Aquí, acostumbramos palabras y expresiones para
describir el vario tiempo games.Module 2 - qué costes él? - 
palabras y expresiones 2.Safir.</string>
          </description>
